Home.title: ICHEC 2026
Home.aboutSubtitle: An Open, Inclusive, and Future-Oriented HCI Community
Home.aboutP1: ICHEC 2026 will be held in Macau SAR, China, continuing the spirit of Human-Computer Interaction (HCI) and focusing on how Artificial Intelligence and emerging technologies intertwine with human values, culture, and lived experiences.
Home.aboutP2: The conference covers the full spectrum of HCI topics, from technical innovation to critical inquiry, and from creative expression to deployable systems. We welcome researchers, designers, artists, and practitioners from around the globe to share their work and perspectives.
Home.aboutP3: We encourage human-centered, responsible AI and interactive technology practices, promoting the effective translation of research into social applications to shape a more inclusive and resilient future technology ecosystem.
Home.themeDescription: Bringing together diverse disciplines and cultural backgrounds, focusing on the social impact and ethical boundaries of human-AI collaboration, and strengthening mutual trust and co-creation in the wave of intelligence.

Common.toBeUpdated: ⚠️ 2025 version for reference - To be updated for 2026
